keyword: how many calories in a 750ml bottle of titos vodka
title: How Many Calories in a 750ml Bottle of Tito's Vodka?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a 750ml bottle of Tito's Vodka—about 1650 from alcohol—with full nutrition breakdown, per 100 ml basis, and serving tips.
h1: How Many Calories in a 750ml Bottle of Tito's Vodka?
assumptions: Tito's Handmade Vodka, 80 proof (40% ABV), unflavored, standard 750 ml bottle; calories from alcohol only.
disclaimer: Calories vary by proof, brand, and additives; assumes pure vodka without mixers. Consume alcohol responsibly and in moderation.

quick_answer.text: A 750 ml bottle of Tito's Vodka contains about 1650 calories, all derived from alcohol.

label_note: Values reflect alcohol-derived energy only; no macronutrients or micronutrients like those in food.

tweaks.label: Adding 1 tsp simple syrup per 100 ml for sweetness
Mixing with equal volume zero-calorie soda water

faqs.q: How many calories in one shot of Tito's Vodka?
faqs.a: A standard 1.5 oz (44 ml) shot has about 97 calories.

faqs.q: Does Tito's Vodka have carbs or sugars?
faqs.a: Unflavored Tito's Vodka has 0 g carbs, fiber, and sugars.

faqs.q: How many standard drinks in a 750ml Tito's Vodka bottle?
Are there fats or proteins in a bottle of Tito's Vodka?
faqs.a: No, 0 g fat and 0 g protein; calories are from alcohol only.

faqs.q: How does ABV affect calories in Tito's Vodka?
faqs.a: Higher ABV increases alcohol content and calories per ml.
